theRhythmGirl:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theRhythmGirl:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theRhythmGirl:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theRhythmGirl:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theRhythmGirl:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theRhythmGirl:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theRhythmGirl:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theRhythmGirl:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theRhythmGirl:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theRhythmGirl:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theRhythmGirl:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theRhythmGirl:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theRhythmGirl:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theRhythmGirl:MandrillStrike.NAME: Mandrill Strike
theRhythmGirl:MandrillStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. therhythmgirl:On_Beat 3: Deal !M! additional damage.

theRhythmGirl:Metronome.NAME: Metronome
theRhythmGirl:Metronome.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 hp. Add a copy of this card to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theRhythmGirl:Metronome.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose 1 hp. Add a copy of this card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theRhythmGirl:AirRally.NAME: Air Rally
theRhythmGirl:AirRally.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. therhythmgirl:On_Beat 1 or 3: NL Apply !M! Weak. NL therhythmgirl:On_Beat 2 or 4: NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

theRhythmGirl:FlipperRolls.NAME: Flipper Roll
theRhythmGirl:FlipperRolls.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.
theRhythmGirl:FlipperRolls.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block !M! times. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

theRhythmGirl:MonkeySeeMonkeyDo.NAME: Monkey Business
theRhythmGirl:MonkeySeeMonkeyDo.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.
theRhythmGirl:MonkeySeeMonkeyDo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a copy of a card from your discard pile into your hand.

theRhythmGirl:DoubleUp.NAME: Double Up
theRhythmGirl:DoubleUp.DESCRIPTION: The first attack you play each turn is played twice.

theRhythmGirl:OddFlamingo.NAME: Odd Flamingo
theRhythmGirl:OddFlamingo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies except the targeted enemy.

theRhythmGirl:SeeSaw.NAME: See Saw
theRhythmGirl:SeeSaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy that did not take damage this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: That enemy already took damage this turn.

theRhythmGirl:Pitch.NAME: Pitch
theRhythmGirl:Pitch.DESCRIPTION: therhythmgirl:On_Beat 1: Add a [#e3be4e]Home [#e3be4e]Run to your hand.
theRhythmGirl:Pitch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: therhythmgirl:On_Beat 1: Add a [#e3be4e]Home [#e3be4e]Run+ to your hand.

theRhythmGirl:Ready.NAME: Rea--dy
theRhythmGirl:Ready.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 additional therhythmgirl:Beat. Draw a card.
